sprint_goal: Establish the service foundation and implement the core user registration flow, enabling new users to be created in the system.
Build the complete CI/CD and deployment pipeline to enable automated, secure deployments to the staging environment.
Implement the complete login lifecycle: email verification, login, session refresh, and secure logout.
Implement self-service account recovery (password reset) and temporary account deactivation/reactivation.
Enhance account security by implementing the full Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) setup and login flow.
Implement the GDPR-compliant permanent account deletion lifecycle, including the grace period and automated data purge.
